title: Oasis
text: Gardens and textiles are meant to be appreciated in a variety of circumstances. The subtlety of this design reminds us that the verdant beauty of a lush desert oasis can be as enticing on moonlit nights as it is during the day.
description: Chintz finish Jacquard damask printed with large, up to 16\", flower & leaf shapes. Vert. rpt. 32\"; horiz. 48\". Cream, grey, tan on grey. Smoked Pearl
